On Wednesday 22 August 2001 03:04, Yanshosh@... wrote:
> Very nice intro!
>
> ::FZ::
>
> The Iron Fist recieves VorbIss's message, forwarding it to FZ, who was
> still waiting for Halucigen to reply. FZ silently sends a reply back,
> though not lowering his guard.
>
> "Welcome to earth, VorbIss," the transmission reads, "this is Zardus,
> Commander of the Alliance, speaking. I will send a shuttle to pick you up
> if you wish to learn more about us."
>
> With that, he sends some commands to a shuttle, the docking bay on the Iron
> Fist opening and a small shuttle flying out, blasting off toward VorbIss.

::VorbIss::

As the message came in, VorbIss halted. There were other robots on this 
planet after all. They called themselves the 'Alliance". 
[Do you know what a name like that means?] posed Iss to his counterpart. [The 
Alliance implies that they are allied against someone. The Alliance is at war 
with someone else on this planet with a probablility of 64% plus/minus 16%.]

"Thanks for the statistics, Iss, but nobody else has said anything." thought 
back Vorb.

However, as if to confim Iss's position, a new message came in immediately: 
"This is Shivah, BlackFortress's second in rank, welcome to Planet Earth... 
We're interesting to get an alliance with you. please reply this message"

Vorb thought for a moment. The Alliance was sending him a shuttle. They must 
already know where he was. BlackFortress, probably an enemy of The Alliance, 
did not know his location. He would go with The Alliance, learn about them 
and learn of Black Fortress through their predicted-to-be warped viewpoint 
about (potentially) one of their enemies.

[Very complex] injected Iss. [But can you make the decision fast? Do I 
contact BlackFortress or not? Because sensors indicate a shuttle is coming 
up.]

Almost validating Iss's readings, the low throb of a shuttle sounded off in 
the direction VorbIss had been headed. 

[Here is what we will do. The Alliance does not know of ht einvitation by 
BlackFortress. We will not tell them. If The Alliance is deemed as an 
unacceptable party, we will defect.] 

Vorb didn't see any better, so he shot of a transmission. "Roger your 
shuttle, Alliance. I'd love to get some info."
